name: Payment Gateway through Unifiedpost
author: Unifiedpost Payments

sections.description:
Enable Unifiedpost payment gateway in your WooCommerce store and automate your payment processes so that your clients can pay you and you get paid on time.

AVAILABLE PAYMENT PRODUCTS
INTERNATIONAL:

  • MasterCard
  • VISA

EUROPEAN/LOCAL PAYMENT METHODS:

  • Bancontact ( Belgium )
  • iDeal ( Netherlands )
  • Bank Transfer ( EU )

HOW TO ENROLL FOR THE PLUGIN

Enrolling for Unifiedpost payment gateway is very simple. Send an email to servicedesk.payments@unifiedpost.com and request the setup of this plugin. We will treat your request as soon as possible.

After the onboarding is done, you will be given an API-Key which needs to be inserted in your WooCommerce settings and you are ready to offer payments to your clients.

BENEFITS OF USING THE UNIFIEDPOST PAYMENTS GATEWAY

  • Offering of easy and secure payment services
  • Personal support in the full lifecycle of your integration
  • Very competitive pricing tailored to your business needs

PRICES

MasterCard , VISA in EU : EUR 0.25 + 1.80%
MasterCard , VISA outside EU : EUR 0.25 + 2.80%
Bancontact : EUR 0.17
iDeal : EUR 0.17
Bank Transfer : EUR 0.22
sections.installation:
In your WooCommerce admin dashboard

  • Navigate to Plugins > add new
  • Search for Unifiedpost
  • Activate the plugin
  • Navigate to WooCommerce Settings > Payments
  • Paste the API-Key in the correct textbox
